metadata.description: The region to deploy the network resources to.
Determines whether or not to deploy the virtual network.
Determines whether or not to deploy the resource group for the virtual network.
Conditional. The name of the resource group to deploy the virtual network to. Required when "deployVnet" is "true".
Conditional. The name of the virtual network. Required when "deployVnet" is "true".
Conditional. The address prefixes for the virtual network. Required when "deployVnet" is "true".
Conditional. The hosts subnet to create within the virtual network. Required when "deployVnet" is "true".
Optional. The private endpoint subnet to create within the virtual network.
Optional. The function app subnet to create within the virtual network.
Optional. The type of default routing used on the subnets.
Optional. Determines if the resources should be named with the resource type at the end.
Conditional. The IP Address the network virtual appliance. Required when "defaultRouting" is "nva".
Optional. The custom DNS servers to use for the virtual network.
Optional. Determines if DDoS network protection should be deployed.
Optional. The resource id of the hub virtual network to which the virtual network should be peered.
Optional. Determines if a virtual network gateway is present on the hub virtual network.
Optional. The subscription id of the subscription to where the private DNS zones should be deployed.
Optional. Determines if the private DNS zones resource group should be deployed.
Conditional. The name of the private DNS zones resource group. Required when any of the private DNS Zones are deployed based on the "createZone" parameters.
Optional. Determines if the Azure Backup private DNS zone should be created.
Optional. The Resource Id of the existing Azure Backup Private DNS Zone.
Optional. Determines if the Azure Blob Storage private DNS zone should be created.
Optional. The Resource Id of the existing Azure Blob Storage Private DNS Zone.
Optional. Determines if the Azure Files Storage private DNS zone should be created.
Optional. The Resource Id of the existing Azure Files Storage Private DNS Zone.
Optional. Determines if the Azure Queue Storage private DNS zone should be created.
Optional. The Resource Id of the existing Azure Queue Storage Private DNS Zone.
Optional. Determines if the Azure Table Storage private DNS zone should be created.
Optional. The Resource Id of the existing Azure Table Storage Private DNS Zone.
Optional. Determines if the Azure Key Vault private DNS zone should be created.
Optional. The Resource Id of the existing Azure Key Vault Private DNS Zone.
Optional. Determines if the AVD feed private DNS zone should be created.
Optional. The Resource Id of the existing AVD Feed Private DNS Zone.
Optional. Determines if the AVD global feed private DNS zone should be created.
Optional. The Resource Id of the existing AVD Global Feed Private DNS Zone.
Optional. Determines if the Azure Web App private DNS zone should be created.
Optional. The Resource Id of the existing Azure Web App Private DNS Zone.
Optional. Determines if the Azure Web App SCM private DNS zone should be created.
Optional. The Resource Id of the existing Azure Web App SCM Private DNS Zone.
Optional. Determines if the private DNS zones should be linked to a new virtual network.

Conditional. The resource id of the virtual network to link the private DNS zones to. Required when "linkPrivateDnsZonesToNewVnet" is "false" and any of the private DNS Zones are deployed or resource Ids provided.
Optional. The tags by resource type to apply to the resources.
DO NOT MODIFY THIS VALUE! The timeStamp is needed to differentiate deployments for certain Azure resources and must be set using a parameter.

variables.createPrivateDNSZones: [or(or(or(or(or(or(or(or(or(parameters('createAzureBackupZone'), parameters('createAzureBlobZone')), parameters('createAzureFilesZone')), parameters('createAzureQueueZone')), parameters('createAzureTableZone')), parameters('createAzureKeyVaultZone')), parameters('createAvdFeedZone')), parameters('createAvdGlobalFeedZone')), parameters('createAzureWebAppZone')), parameters('createAzureWebAppScmZone'))]

variables.defaultUDRs: [if(equals(variables('azureCloud'), 'AzureCloud'), createArray(createObject('name', 'AVDServiceTraffic', 'properties', createObject('addressPrefix', 'WindowsVirtualDesktop', 'hasBgpOverride', true(), 'nextHopType', 'Internet')), createObject('name', 'AVDStunInfraTurnRelayTraffic', 'properties', createObject('addressPrefix', '20.202.0.0/16', 'hasBgpOverride', true(), 'nextHopType', 'Internet')), createObject('name', 'AVDTurnRelayTraffic', 'properties', createObject('addressPrefix', '51.5.0.0/16', 'hasBgpOverride', true(), 'nextHopType', 'Internet')), createObject('name', 'DirectRouteToKMS', 'properties', createObject('addressPrefix', '20.118.99.224/32', 'hasBgpOverride', true(), 'nextHopType', 'Internet')), createObject('name', 'DirectRouteToKMS01', 'properties', createObject('addressPrefix', '40.83.235.53/32', 'hasBgpOverride', true(), 'nextHopType', 'Internet')), createObject('name', 'DirectRouteToKMS02', 'properties', createObject('addressPrefix', '23.102.135.246/32', 'hasBgpOverride', true(), 'nextHopType', 'Internet'))), if(equals(variables('azureCloud'), 'AzureUSGovernment'), createArray(createObject('name', 'AVDServiceTraffic', 'properties', createObject('addressPrefix', 'WindowsVirtualDesktop', 'hasBgpOverride', true(), 'nextHopType', 'Internet')), createObject('name', 'AVDStunTurnTraffic', 'properties', createObject('addressPrefix', '20.202.0.0/16', 'hasBgpOverride', true(), 'nextHopType', 'Internet')), createObject('name', 'DirectRouteToKMS', 'properties', createObject('addressPrefix', '23.97.0.13/32', 'hasBgpOverride', true(), 'nextHopType', 'Internet')), createObject('name', 'DirectRouteToKMS01', 'properties', createObject('addressPrefix', '52.126.105.2/32', 'hasBgpOverride', true(), 'nextHopType', 'Internet'))), createArray()))]
variables.snetFunctionApp: [if(not(empty(parameters('functionAppSubnet'))), createArray(createObject('name', parameters('functionAppSubnet').name, 'properties', createObject('addressPrefix', parameters('functionAppSubnet').addressPrefix, 'delegations', createArray(createObject('name', 'Microsoft.Web/serverFarms', 'properties', createObject('ServiceName', 'Microsoft.Web/serverFarms')))))), createArray())]

properties.routes: [if(equals(parameters('defaultRouting'), 'default'), variables('defaultUDRs'), if(equals(parameters('defaultRouting'), 'nva'), createArray(createObject('name', 'DefaultRoute', 'properties', createObject('addressPrefix', '0.0.0.0/0', 'nextHopType', 'VirtualAppliance', 'nextHopIpAddress', parameters('nvaIPAddress')))), createArray()))]

privateDnsZonesToCreate.value: [union(if(parameters('createAzureBackupZone'), filter(reference(subscriptionResourceId('Microsoft.Resources/deployments', format('Private-Dns-Zone-Names-{0}', parameters('timeStamp'))), '2022-09-01').outputs.zoneNames.value, lambda('name', contains(lambdaVariables('name'), '.backup.'))), createArray()), if(parameters('createAzureBlobZone'), filter(reference(subscriptionResourceId('Microsoft.Resources/deployments', format('Private-Dns-Zone-Names-{0}', parameters('timeStamp'))), '2022-09-01').outputs.zoneNames.value, lambda('name', contains(lambdaVariables('name'), '.blob.'))), createArray()), if(parameters('createAzureFilesZone'), filter(reference(subscriptionResourceId('Microsoft.Resources/deployments', format('Private-Dns-Zone-Names-{0}', parameters('timeStamp'))), '2022-09-01').outputs.zoneNames.value, lambda('name', contains(lambdaVariables('name'), '.file.'))), createArray()), if(parameters('createAzureQueueZone'), filter(reference(subscriptionResourceId('Microsoft.Resources/deployments', format('Private-Dns-Zone-Names-{0}', parameters('timeStamp'))), '2022-09-01').outputs.zoneNames.value, lambda('name', contains(lambdaVariables('name'), '.queue.'))), createArray()), if(parameters('createAzureTableZone'), filter(reference(subscriptionResourceId('Microsoft.Resources/deployments', format('Private-Dns-Zone-Names-{0}', parameters('timeStamp'))), '2022-09-01').outputs.zoneNames.value, lambda('name', contains(lambdaVariables('name'), '.table.'))), createArray()), if(parameters('createAzureKeyVaultZone'), filter(reference(subscriptionResourceId('Microsoft.Resources/deployments', format('Private-Dns-Zone-Names-{0}', parameters('timeStamp'))), '2022-09-01').outputs.zoneNames.value, lambda('name', contains(lambdaVariables('name'), '.vaultcore.'))), createArray()), if(parameters('createAvdFeedZone'), filter(reference(subscriptionResourceId('Microsoft.Resources/deployments', format('Private-Dns-Zone-Names-{0}', parameters('timeStamp'))), '2022-09-01').outputs.zoneNames.value, lambda('name', contains(lambdaVariables('name'), 'privatelink.wvd.'))), createArray()), if(parameters('createAvdGlobalFeedZone'), filter(reference(subscriptionResourceId('Microsoft.Resources/deployments', format('Private-Dns-Zone-Names-{0}', parameters('timeStamp'))), '2022-09-01').outputs.zoneNames.value, lambda('name', contains(lambdaVariables('name'), 'privatelink-global.wvd.'))), createArray()), if(parameters('createAzureWebAppZone'), filter(reference(subscriptionResourceId('Microsoft.Resources/deployments', format('Private-Dns-Zone-Names-{0}', parameters('timeStamp'))), '2022-09-01').outputs.zoneNames.value, lambda('name', or(contains(lambdaVariables('name'), '.azurewebsites.'), contains(lambdaVariables('name'), '.appservice.')))), createArray()), if(parameters('createAzureWebAppScmZone'), filter(reference(subscriptionResourceId('Microsoft.Resources/deployments', format('Private-Dns-Zone-Names-{0}', parameters('timeStamp'))), '2022-09-01').outputs.zoneNames.value, lambda('name', contains(lambdaVariables('name'), '.scm.'))), createArray()))]

parameters.privateDnsZonesVnetId: [if(not(empty(parameters('privateDnsZonesVnetId'))), createObject('value', parameters('privateDnsZonesVnetId')), if(parameters('linkPrivateDnsZonesToNewVnet'), createObject('value', reference(subscriptionResourceId('Microsoft.Resources/deployments', format('Network-Resources-{0}', parameters('timeStamp'))), '2022-09-01').outputs.vNetResourceId.value), createObject('value', '')))]
